metadata.dc:author: Graña Gil, J
Atanes Sandoval, A
Lorenzo Porto, J A
Sánchez Bursón, J M
Vidal Gayoso, R
Gómez Rodríguez, N
Galdo Fernández, F
metadata.dc:description: We report four patients (3 males and one female) suffering a sternoclavicular staphylococcal arthritis in whom risk factors such as parenteral drug addiction, alcoholism, diabetes, or immunosuppression were not observed. The etiopathogenesis, clinical picture, and diagnosis of this uncommon septic arthritis in reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Artritis estafilocócica esternoclavicular en pacientes no inmunodeprimidos. Estudio de 4 casos.
[Sternoclavicular staphylococcal arthritis in non-immunodepressed patients. Study of 4 cases].
